name: Griffin Miller
text: Blaze pizza is one of my favorite places to go. Whether you‚Äôre on the go or dining in, it is the perfect place to customize according to your liking. Convenient, consistent, and great priced every time. To me this location can‚Äôt be beat. ‚Ä¶More

name: jims72vega
text: I have been driving by this place for a while now.. today I stopped to get lunch toppings were great and it really didn't taste franchise food.. great selection of soft drinks.. best pizza experience in a long time.. employees are very helpful and explain the process of building your own pizza..

name: Giovany Addun
text: The pizza was good. When I visited 4 weeks ago there were only 2 people working :-/. They were clearly overwhelmed but the girls working there were still very sweet. ‚Ä¶More

name: Antoine Foggs
text: I haven't had blaze in a long while, so this was a nice experience. When I came, I was in the middle of a lengthy phone call which helped to pass the time, but it seems like the staff that were there that day were newer. The time it took ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Athey
text: Blaze pizza no matter what city you are in is always good. Their GF crust is great. Everyone seems happy to be working there and to help you. Happy the outdoor seating has been reopened. Ps. Somebody was not expecting to be photographed.

name: Lori Leger
text: First time I had been. The girl who waited on me was very helpful, and made great suggestions.  My pizza was so delicious,  and it is really fast, 3 minutes.  Totally going back again!

name: Gabriella Johnson
text: You can Make your own pizza with unlimited toppings for 1 flat price! And its really great!!

name: Alec Foster
text: Incredibly nice employees and tasty pizza as always! Definitely one of the best blaze pizzas there is.

name: Brittany Zumwalt
text: Food was awesome ... The staff was amazing. Gave my boyfriend our pizza free just because we had to wait a little.

name: Jay Guelfi
text:
TL;DR:  All in all, an excellent meal.  Highly recommend.

We really enjoyed our lunch today.  We each got the "Take 2" -1/2 of a pizza and ‚Ä¶More

name: Drkfallen Martinez
text: I went there for Lunch and I'm quite surprised at how it is set up ! They have machines that shapes the dough ( which is a good thing for our youth to learn ) ! The Employees seem pretty good even when they have a line out the door ! The ‚Ä¶More

name: Aaron Godwin
text: I‚Äôm so over wasting my money here. The app and ordering for pick up or delivery is a joke. One time I ordered delivery and it never came. Since they use door dash for delivery but nothing else, door dash couldn‚Äôt help me and no one at the ‚Ä¶More

name: janet green
text: Awesome I can design my own pizza

name: lupitha alvarado
text: Great prize! Freshly made! So delicious!

name: Heather Smith
text: Ingredients were good. Some of the staff seemed unsure of what they were doing. Overall decent pizza.

name: Craig Ray
text: The food was delicious. The staff is so friendly and professional. I can't wait to go back!

name: K Miner
text: Pretty good pizza and great topping selection. The best part is the staff, they are so friendly and helpful with recommending toppings and different combinations. I went in last week and every employee was so nice and helpful. By far above and beyond what you would expect.

name: Jonathan Witt
text: Blaze Pizza let's you create your own pizza. They have a ton of options to choose from, and prices are reasonable. The staff is very friendly and ready to help you make a great pizza!

name: Eric Gordon
text: Love the food. They have amazing service

name: Chris Huskey
text: This place is great. The perfect place to take the family who can't agree on what they want on a pizza. Pizza was very good. I recommend it.

name: Alasa Harper
text: Delicious! Everything is fresh and they are taking extra precautions to make sure everything is safe - had to wear a mask in the store.

name: Audri Sampson
text: I LOVE their pizza and topping options!

name: Shannon Kuykendall
text: Tell them what you want on it for 1 price. Can't beat it. Pizza is awesome

name: Jonathan Larson
text: Been here three times now and enjoyed it every time. The line was almost out the door whenever I went, but they kept it moving along pretty quickly. I like that once you go for anything more than a two-topping pizza any additional toppings ‚Ä¶More

name: Alex Gentner
text: The pizza is very good just like always, and just like at all the locations I‚Äôve been to. The problem is the staff. It was very slow getting a pizza. I had two people in front of me and it took 35 minutes to get them to make the pizza. I‚Äôve ‚Ä¶More

name: Carolyn Grove
text: Best experience ever! Drew rocks. She took such good care of us and our pizza was amazing

name: H. Roberta Williams
text: When I left SC, I knew I was gonna miss Mod pizza.  Blaze eased the home sickness.  Plus their blood orange lemonade was outstanding,  the service was great,  and the food was delicious.  Not a bad investment,  Lebron. *salute*

name: Eliezer Mvuezolo
text: You guys rock. Delicious pizza on a decent wait time

name: Randy Allen
text: Great food you pick one of theirs or build your own add any toppings all for one price . Cooked in fast fire oven for 180 seconds . They also have signature pizza's, Dough knots. Desserts include brownies , chocolate chip and s'more cookies . Beer bottled and draft and wine where available.  Dough is made fresh daily never frozen.

name: Thomas Myers
text: Online order only...silly to refuse to even talk to a customer, I am from Florida, how should I know the details of your menu...

name: Kris Bryant's Wifey
text: I had Blaze Pizza for the first time today and was pleasantly surprised at how good it was! Fresh ingredients, great service, fast food without the typical *fast* food taste. Will recommend!

name: Jerry Davis
text: Very good pizza, and fast. Place is very busy. Fire grilled pizza is chow,  very reasonably priced.

name: Jane Long
text: This place is super yummy! Best deal if you order a Signature pizza you can extra toppings for free. Highly recommend but they neglect cleaning off there tables regularly.

name: Doris Pope
text: Oh my god one word delicious

name: Candyce Jones
text: Yum ok? First time going here and did not know I had one near me in my own town. Great quality of the ingredients and stellar options for vegetarians. Pesto sauce was amazing. Fast and tasty.

name: William Alexander
text: Yes they do offer  delivery now...the pizza is pretty gud they offer fresh toppings and a make as u go assembly line similar to Subway which is a good idea but not worth the price....in the long run I would eat here again

name: Yoselyn Fuentes
text: It was too thick and soggy

name: Joann Felkner
text:
Staff Caroline was friendly and thorough. She made sure I had what I wanted on my pizza.
It cooked quickly and was very good.  Loved the freshness of the ingredients. I would highly recommend this restaurant.

name: Randy C
text: Pizza was tasty, better if it was served hot and not room temp. The dude making the pizza seemed like making pizza was a punishment; enthusiasm level was in the negative digits, sighing and mumbling under his breath the entire time. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Zubair
text: If you're looking for a true pizza experience, look away. For around $8, you'll get burnt up thin crust and unlimited toppings. Not much flavor there. Nice, clean ambience and friendly staff. Save those $ and savor a true pizza.

name: Andrew Miller
text: Its like a subway for pizza. You start with your dough and choose from a vast array of high quality pizza toppings. Their  teas and limonaids are also a must try item.

name: Tammy Talks
text: Great staff!  Always friendly and aiming to please their customers!  Great food, relaxed atmosphere.

name: Misty Specht
text: It was my first time there will definitely be going back. The only thing I would say was for thin crust I would have liked my crust to be crispier, but I did have four different types of cheeses and an olive oil drizzle so that didn't help ‚Ä¶More

name: steven welch
text: Very good personal sized pizzas with unlimited toppings blazed in a fire oven quickly. I personally like the "Red Vine", which is a simple vegetarian, but there are plenty of meat options. Simple or complex built your way in an assembly line process for you.

name: J A
text: Great food, love the build your own pizza option. And all for great prices.

name: J P
text: Your pizza is custom made. Right in front of you. Once in their oven you will have your pizza in less than 10 minutes. The crust is perfect, the sauce is good and the cheese comes out melted perfectly. You get a really good pizza at a reasonable price.

name: ChandraFryer
text: Delightful GLUTEN FREE crust! My picky son loved their garlic knots.

name: Melody Kane
text: Delicious. Love the soda fountain options too- that root beer is great!

name: Shriekin' Hunter
text: Don't order online. Came to pick up when order said was ready. Waited one hour and pizza hasn't even been made. I blame not the staff because there were only two employees. Absolutely horrendous management skills.

text: Awesome üëå pizza üçï üòã

text: DO NOT ORDER DELIVERY THROUGH THEM!!! They outsource through Door Dash and then when the order is completely ruined they blame door dash and say I have to get my refund through them. Which is impossible because only Blaze has my credit card ‚Ä¶More

text: Staffs are always nice, great pizza, and great price!  Always love this place.

name: Scott Koster
text: Great food with friendly service

name: Mia
text: The staff ensures no matter what, you get your pizza just how you want it. The pizza is consistently delicious and it's so fun to try out different toppings every time! Very quick and convenient as well.

name: Seth Burch
text: Best Blaze in Central Illinois.

name: Aaron Masters
text: Service is so slow here, not like other Blaze locations. It seems like the employees are not properly trained and there is no leadership. The pizza is good but set aside 30 minutes if they are slow and 45 plus if they are busy

name: Aaron Cunningham
text: Pizza is delicious. It takes a little while for the pizza to be done but it is worth the wait!

name: Nelson Moy
text:
Restaurant review
At last the chipotle style pizza chain is here in Champaign. Although there are higher end make your own pizza places like pizzeria antica or similar ‚Ä¶More

name: Sarah Kresca
text: The guy that pulled the pizzas out, Gunner, was so nice and helpful. I told him I wanted it more well done and he had no problem putting it back in the oven. He always has a smile on!

name: Hope Lopez
text: Great pizza!  Delicious!   Only thing is maybe could improve customer service.

name: Tyler Schaffer
text: Although the line was quite long, the prices were reasonable and the pizza delicious. The cheese was cooked to perfection!

name: Jeff Decker
text: Good pizza, it's my go to pizza spot. They have vegan cheese(daiya) available and will change gloves upon request.

name: Joanna Pickering
text: Great pizza. We were out Christmas shopping and this was perfect for a break.

name: David Lustek
text: I come from Chicago and almost every pizza joint in Chicago is fantastic, Blaze is phenomenal. I think what really makes it worth it, is the fact that you are telling them what exactly you want on your pizza, how much of that topping you want on it, and where you want it. Delightful!

name: Sneh P
text: Good food, good prices, but the staff at this location is the slowest I have ever seen at any Blaze Pizza. If there are 5-7 people in front of you then expect over 20-30 minutes of waiting. The staff is not efficient and do not care, they do not smile, or even acknowledge you when you walk in.

text: I loved it! Definitely recommend this place. I had the veggie pizza and this taste delicious. I waiting time was good, I probably spent 15 min there between ordering and getting my order.

text: Very nice, good pizza. If you have food allergies beware of cross contamination with food bins they store ingredients in tend to have drippings from other bins.
